name: Angle
description: Angle is a decentralized protocol built on Ethereum which allows borrowing of stablecoins, called agTokens, which are pegged to specific value. Angle has core two modules: the Angle Core module and the Angle Borrowing module. Angle is governed by its staked governance token ANGLE in the form of veANGLE.
